amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to enforce the requirement under the Housing Act of 1937 relating to community service.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 38 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill to implement or enforce the requirement under the Housing Act of 1937 relating to community service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rangel amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
